citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 d 1 ii
At the time of inspection protocol 2016-0040 was reviewed. The protocol involves a thoracotomy. The investigator
did not incorporate this key word when doing his literature search for alternatives to painful procedures.
The investigator needs to resubmit his search for alternatives for painful procedures including the search for a
thoracotomy to the IACUC.
